# maze-seeker
Repository for Artificial Intelligence - Group 5. We will be implementing a hide and seek game with autonomous agents for both hiding and seeking.
```
+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+
|        |                 |  |           |     |
+  +--+  +  +--+--+--+--+  +  +  +  +--+  +--+  +
|  |        |     |        |     |  |  |     |  |
+  +--+--+--+  +  +  +--+--+  +--+  +  +--+  +  +
|        |     |  |  |        |     |           |
+--+--+  +  +--+  +  +--+--+--+  +--+--+--+--+  +
|     |  |     |  |  |        |        |     |  |
+  +  +  +--+  +  +  +  +--+  +--+--+  +  +  +  +
|  |     |     |  |     |  |        |     |  |  |
+  +--+  +  +--+  +--+--+  +--+--+  +  +--+  +  +
|  |     |  |  |     |        |     |     |  |  |
+  +--+--+  +  +--+--+  +--+--+  +--+--+--+  +  +
|  |     |  |        |           |           |  |
+  +  +  +  +  +  +--+  +--+--+--+--+  +--+--+  +
|     |     |  |                       |      01|
+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+--+
```
